text: inezīyanimi mets’iḥāfini yeteset’utini be’āsireji hulu bitimet’achewi k’ībilahini āyiketelumi፡፡ ānitemi k’ībilachewini teketayi āyidelehimi፡፡ kefīlachewimi yekefīluni k’ībila teketayi āyidelumi፡፡ ke‘iwik’etimi (kera‘iyi) kemet’alihi beḫwala zinibalēyachewini bitiketeli ānite yani gīzē kebedayochi nehi፡፡
